verses.roman:
tad-rakṣiṇaḥ sānucaraṁ
kupitā ātatāyinaḥ
gṛhītu-kāmā āvavrur
gṛhyatāṁ vadhyatām iti

synonyms: tat—its; rakṣiṇaḥ—guards; sa—along with; anucaram—His companions; kupitāḥ—angered; ātatāyinaḥ—holding weapons; gṛhītu—to catch; kāmāḥ—wanting; āvavruḥ—surrounded; gṛhyatām—seize Him; vadhyatām—kill Him; iti—thus saying.
translation: The enraged guards then took up their weapons and, wanting to seize Kṛṣṇa and His companions, surrounded them and shouted, "Grab Him! Kill Him!"
